mean_cn: n. 喧闹，强烈的要求；  v. 喧嚷，强烈的要求
mean_en: a loud continuous noise (such as the noise made when many people are talking or shouting)
word_etyma: clam呼喊 + or名词后缀 → clamor 喧闹
short_phrase: cause a clamor with the loudspeaker
sentence: The protests caused a clamor outside.
sentence_trans: 抗议活动将外面弄得很喧闹。
